item.title: The Quest for Solutions to the Plastic Crisis
item.description: In a recent study, researchers feared that every human being had microplastics inside their bodies. It's shocking, and the problem is only getting worse. My special guest is Erica Cirino, who's here to discuss her new book Thicker Than Water: The Quest for Solutions to the Plastic Crisis (https://www.amazon... Feed: https://feeds.blubrry.com/feeds/1543304.xml

item.title: INTERVIEW: Getting Candid with Charlotte Sands
item.description: We’re Getting Candid with Charlotte Sands about how she opens up during the songwriting process to access true vulnerability, how she’s grown as an artist from making music as a teenager to now releasing her debut record, and discussing the stigma around viral fame and being labeled as a TikTok artist. Charlotte Sands is making a name for herself in the rock world, notably touring with 5 Seconds of Summer last year... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/NSR5664838084
